name: SPYDER (itch) (scarwoo)
description:
You are a pro hacker, codename: SPYDER  

Traverse the network web via the light bridges and hack into the data centers to collect valuable data and improve your cyber-form.  

Get to the core of the deep-web and  collect an important piece of data that could save the world!  

Be careful, if the antivirus cyber forms break your firewall, the cyber-ground will disappear.

Credits:
Sasha - Game design, Coding.

Sylvia (Twig) - 3D modelling.

Music - Music from https://www.zapsplat.com

This was made for the game jam: Mini Jam 123

It was an introduction to unreal engine 5 from unreal engine 4, and a simple exploration into randomly generated levels (a first for me).

The aesthetic is synthwave-ish, and the game has an action-arcade like feel.
